txt.en: One of your Legendary Items has reached level 10. Every 10 levels a Legendary Item will need to be reforged in order to unlock its further potential. Depending on the level and rarity of the item you may be able to reach anywhere from level 30 to 60. When you have reached the Item's max level, whether it is 30, 40, 50, or 60 you will be able to re-forge it one last time, even though the last re-forge will not unlock further leveling potential. For items that can reach level 60, a Scroll of Delving can be used to add an additional 10 levels to the item and you will be able to re-forge it once again at level 70.

One of your Legendary Items has reached level 10. Every 10 levels a Legendary Item will need to be reforged in order to unlock its further potential. Depending on the level and rarity of the item you may be able to reach anywhere from level 30 to 60. When you have reached the Item's max level, whether it is 30, 40, 50, or 60 you will be able to reforge it one last time, even though the last reforge will not unlock further levelling potential. For items that can reach level 60, a Scroll of Delving can be used to add an additional 10 levels to the item and you will be able to reforge it once again at level 70.
